Video - video player widget¶

class pymt.ui.widgets.videowidget.MTVideo(**kwargs)¶

MTVideo is a video player, implemented in top of MTScatterWidget. You can use it like this

video = MTVideo(video='source_file')
Parameters:
video : stsize=iw.size, r

Filename of video
draw()¶
hide_controls(dt)¶
on_touch_down(touches, touchID, x, y)¶
class pymt.ui.widgets.videowidget.MTVideoMute(**kwargs)¶

MTVideoMute is a mute button class of the video widget

on_touch_down(touches, touchID, x, y)¶
class pymt.ui.widgets.videowidget.MTVideoPlayPause(**kwargs)¶

MTVideoPlayPause is a dynamic play/pause button of the video widget

on_touch_down(touches, touchID, x, y)¶
class pymt.ui.widgets.videowidget.MTVideoTimeline(**kwargs)¶

MTVideoTimeline is a part of the video widget which tracks the video playback
